pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

The Prime Minister commended President Sall on Senegalâ€™s commitment to peace and democracy. The leaders also discussed regional security issues and how to further deepen the already strong bilateral ties between the two countries.

The two leaders looked forward to their continued collaboration on issues of mutual concern.
